column4: can anyone help me with vncserver? i have sshed into the server and started vncserver -AlwaysShared then connected from the client PC but i get a broken x window with an X cursoe and nothing else.... anyhelp?
you have nothing running on the VNC display.
if you're using the common "vncserver", edit your ~/.vnc/xstartup script to start metacity, xterm, etc..
just edit it, and add some programs to run when you start the VNC.
